purpose: To provide a framework for orchestrating and managing AI agents, enabling more efficient and controlled workflows
principle: Built on top of Prefect, it leverages workflow orchestration principles to manage AI agent operations and interactions
reusability: Highly composable with Prefect's ecosystem, supports integration with various AI models and workflows
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and have limited stability
